data.actual_result: Your name has its last letter cut off mid-letter
data.expected_result: Your name has "..." appended to it
data.short_description: Long names will have their last letter cut off mid-letter
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your nickname to something that is 18 letters long ("STUPID EGG SANDWICH", in all capitals, works) - Send a message and look at your name
